Event.MetaKeywords: Common ENT related issues, early identification and prevention
Event.MetaDescription: Monthly event from South Indian Society London
Event.Address: Little Chalfont Village Hall, Cokes Lane, Little Chalfont, HP8 4UD
Event.Maindescription:
Common ENT related issues, early identification and prevention (where possible) by Dr. Maheshwar, ENT specialist

Bingo with a difference by Smt. Raji Rajagopal

Nibbles and tea will be available

THERE WILL BE A Q&A SESSION AT THE END OF THE TALK. HOWEVER PLEASE FEEL FREE TO SEND YOUR QUESTIONS TO DR. MAHESHWAR IN ADVANCE, BY SENDING AN E-MAIL TO sisnambalava@gmail.com

And all this is for FREE !!!

Please send RSVP by 15th of March , by send an e-mail to sisnambalava@gmail.com
